N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 816.7 - Additional requirements for medically supervised inpatient withdrawal and stabilization services

State Regulations
(a) Medically
supervised withdrawal services can be delivered only by a provider of services
certified by the Office to provide a continuum of care encompassing: residential, inpatient or outpatient substance use disorder treatment services
in order to ensure appropriate continuation in treatment. (b) Each inpatient medically supervised
withdrawal service shall have a director who is a qualified health professional
with at least two years of full-time clinical work experience in the treatment
of substance use disorder prior to appointment. The director may also serve as
director of another service provided by the same governing authority. Notes
